name: Mini HTMLs
description: Random assortment of small projects with HTML, CSS, and JS.

name: Hyper Flexible Timer
description: A timer/stopwatch hybrid that focuses on flexibility and simplicity. Built with Vue 3 and Astro.

name: Userscripts
description: A collection of userscripts and userstyles, free to use.

name: Domino English Translation
description: A project to translate Domino, a Japanese MIDI editor.

name: Scratch Addons
description: A browser extension for Scratch website. Mainly as a website maintainer.

name: The 2022 r/place Atlas
description: A project to catalog all the artworks of Reddit's 2022 r/place event. Worked with a team to remaster the website.

name: Black MIDI Meta
description: Repository of Black MIDI meta texts and stuff.

name: Pixel Adblock Filters
description: Personal ad block filters (it blocks more than ads). Mainly made for uBlock Origin

name: MediaWiki Scripts
description: Collection of scripts for editing in MediaWiki sites (also known as wikis), such as Wikipedia, Fandom, etc
